word_mean: 生物体，有机体：任何单个的活体，不论其为动物或植物

sentence.Network_en: The human organism learns partly by nature, partly by nurture.
sentence.Network_cn: 人的学习能力部分是天生的，部分是后天培养的。

sentence.Network_en: The army is an extremely complex organism.
sentence.Network_cn: 军队是一个极其复杂的组织.

sentence.Network_en: The amoeba is a very simple organism.
sentence.Network_cn: 变形虫是很简单的生物体.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent. (in the sense 'organization', from organize): current senses derive from French organisme

entry.tran: 生物；有机体；（尤指）微生物
entry.def: An organism is an animal or plant, especially one that is so small that you cannot see it without using a microscope.

example.ex: Not all chemicals normally present in living organisms are harmless.
example.tran: 并不是所有常见于生物体中的化学物质都无害。

example.ex: ...the insect-borne organisms that cause sleeping sickness.
example.tran: 通过昆虫传播、导致昏睡病的微生物

means.word_mean: 1. a living thing that has (or can develop) the ability to act or function independently
2. a system considered analogous in structure or function to a living body;

auth_sentence.content: The more an organism has the smarter they are.
auth_sentence.res_content: The more an organism has the smarter they are.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The more an organism has the smarter they are.

auth_sentence.content: Forget this fossil crap, evolve me an organism.
auth_sentence.res_content: Forget this fossil crap, evolve me an organism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Forget this fossil crap, evolve me an organism.

auth_sentence.content: In this way, the organism can perceive them.
auth_sentence.res_content: In this way, the organism can perceive them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In this way, the organism can perceive them.

stems_affixes.word_buile: in无+organic[adj.器官的, 有机的, 组织的]→adj.无生物的, 无机的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 器官的, 有机的, 组织的
stems_affixes.word_buile: organ[ n.器官;风琴;机构]+ic……的→adj.器官的, 有机的, 组织的
organ器官,工具→ n.器官;风琴;机构
organ器官,工具+ism性质→n.生物体, 有机体
organize[v.组织, 使有机化, 给予生机 v.组织起来]→ v.组织

stems_affixes.value_cn: 组织, 使有机化, 给予生机
stems_affixes.word_buile: organ器官;机构+ize……化→v.组织, 使有机化, 给予生机 v.组织起来

means.word_mean: 有机物, 有机体; 生物

sentences.en: It was an infectious organism that he studied.
sentences.cn: 他研究的是一种可传染病菌的微生物。

sentences.en: The army is an extremely complex organism.
sentences.cn: 军队是一个极其复杂的组织。

jushi.english: He is examining the organism of the herring.
jushi.chinese: 他正在观察鲱鱼的机体。

jushi.english: Factories and cities are more complex organisms than self-sufficient villages.
jushi.chinese: 工厂和城市是比自给自足的村庄更复杂的机体。
